description: Bring the flavours of the Mediterranean to your plate with this mouthwatering meal of lamb chops, fresh herbs, roasted veg and crumbly feta.

default: 1 red or yellow pepper, cut in large chunks

steps: Using a pestle and mortar or wooden spoon and bowl, pound together the fresh mint, fresh rosemary and the garlic, then mix with 1 tbsp olive oil. Smear over four lean lamb chops or cutlets.
Place the aubergine, courgette and red or yellow pepper on to a baking sheet. Drizzle with 1 tbsp olive oil and place the lamb chops on top. Bake in the oven for 20-25 minutes.
Top the chops with feta cheese and add the cherry tomatoes to the pan. Cook for a further 10 minutes until the cheese just starts to brown.
Serve the chops with the roasted vegetables, toasted ciabatta bread and mixed leaf salad.
title: Mediterranean lamb chops
